prompts: Create a sleek, humanoid Pokemon that embodies speed and elegance with long limbs and antennae.
Design a mystical creature with a striking white and gold color palette that flies gracefully.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon with insect-like features and a slender, agile body that can move swiftly.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that resembles a delicate dancer, with wings that shimmer in sunlight.
Imagine a bug/fighting type Pokemon that stands tall, showcasing a combination of grace and power.
Make an ultra-rare Pokemon that has elegant curves and a futuristic appearance, fitting for the Ultra Beasts.
Give me a Pokemon that exudes confidence and agility, with features that make it look like a ballet dancer.
